## Checklist
### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have run the linter and formatter

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally
- [ ] I have tested this on multiple browsers (if frontend)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] I have added/updated type definitions
- [ ] I have updated API documentation (if applicable)

### Security & Compliance
- [ ] My changes don't introduce security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have considered multi-tenant isolation
- [ ] I have ensured audit trail requirements are met
- [ ] Sensitive data is properly handled

### Performance
- [ ] I have considered the performance impact of my changes
- [ ] Database queries are optimized (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added appropriate indexes (if applicable)
